Class Interactable

java.lang.Object
  


Direct Known Subclasses: 
Character








public class Interactable
extends PhysicalObject

Interactable is an extension of the PhysicalObject Class This is reserved for non character interactable objects i.e. crates, bombs, chests, etc

Version:
(0.1)
Author:
(John Remmes)
